description:
Here it is – a home that captures the essence of relaxation with gorgeous golf views and a shimmering pool for ultimate summer fun.

This single level residence enjoys a golf frontage position with spacious parkland opposite. A sought-after northerly aspect to the rear entertaining areas ensures all day light & sunshine, tempered by a soothing tree-scape to golf with picturesque postcard views of the 6th fairway and golf green.

The spacious backyard area allows for plenty of outdoor recreation with an additional decked, and very useable space at the side of the home with an Easterly aspect creating the perfect sunny spot for your morning coffee. This area is fully fenced and child-friendly. The generous 911sq/m block has also been fully landscaped for minimal maintenance.

The modern, open-plan kitchen with generous island bench and handy butler's pantry with its own sink adjoins the spacious dining & family areas leading seamlessly to the undercover outdoor entertaining area. An impressive feature of the kitchen is the double Belling oven able to cater to the largest of families.

Accommodation features of this beautifully presented property include 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (with an en-suite to the main bedroom) and a very spacious media room/2nd living space.

Your cars and golf buggy will be safely housed in the oversized garage and dedicated buggy storage area.

This property is permanently tenanted and limited inspection times will be available. All inspections must be booked a minimum of 48 hour's notice.

Why you'll love living at The Vintage…
The Vintage Estate and Golf Course has been described as the "North Shore of the Hunter" and it's easy to understand why.

This sought-after enclave of unique, quality homes is interwoven with a Greg Norman designed championship 18-hole golf course, the Grand Mercure Hotel & Chateau Elan Destination Spa, & is surrounded by an idyllic, leafy country landscape of rolling hills & vineyards.

Seemingly worlds away from hustle & bustle yet close to urban conveniences, a short drive from the vibrant towns of Maitland, Singleton & Cessnock, with Newcastle within easy reach via the Hunter Expressway.

An abundance of lifestyle & entertainment is on offer with The Vintage being on the doorstep of 3 major concert venues in the Hunter + over 150 wineries, cellar doors & a feast of restaurants & cafes.

listers.name: Robert Brooks
listers.job_title: Sales & Marketing Director. Licensee in Charge.
